p: Myritol ®318 was purchased from Henkel (Dusseldorf, Germany), while Sabowax ®AE and glycerin were acquired from Sabo (Levate, Italy). Lanette 16 and stearyl alcohol were bought from Cognis (Monheim, Germany), while sodium benzoate was obtained from Zdravlje (Leskovac, Serbia) and purified water was from Medical faculty in Niš (Serbia).
